sqlMap.update: update student_application_status as sas join system_values as sv on sv.university_id=sas.university_id and STR_TO_DATE(substr(sv.value, 1, 8), '%Y%m%d')=sas.session_start_date and STR_TO_DATE(substr(sv.value, 9, 8), '%Y%m%d')=sas.session_end_date and sv.code='ADMSSN' set sas.application_status=#applicationStatus# , sas.application_document_path=#documentPath#, sas.tab_status=#tabStatus# where sas.application_number=#applicationNumber# and sas.university_id=sv.university_id;
sqlMap.select: select value as docId from system_values where code=#documentType#;
